| HistoryText             = Influenced by the [[Bloodraven Cult (Earth-616)|Bloodravens]],{{r|Marvel Mystery Handbook 70th Anniversary Special #1|; [[Red Raven (Earth-616)|Red Raven]]'s entry}} the Citizens' Council of the [[Bird People]] sought to attack humanity.{{r|X-Men #44}}

[[Red Raven (Earth-616)|Red Raven]] tried to convince them of renouncing their plans, but in vain as the Council turned him down. Red Raven then went to [[Aerivar XVIII (Earth-616)|their King]], who rejected his pleas as well.{{r|X-Men #44}}
